name: abs2difabsd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmin, cfv(cabs, c1))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmin, cfv(cabs, c1))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
